org.osdfreactive.abstractactions

Class IntraRouteAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osdfreactive.abstractactions.AbstractAction
      • org.osdfreactive.abstractactions.IntraRouteAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IntraRouteActionInterface

    @Service
public class IntraRouteAction
extends AbstractAction
implements IntraRouteActionInterface
    Route data traffic based on a high level network policy inside a local region.
